name: NightHover
description:
The NightCity at night is a hoverbike racing arena. Have fun in 43 levels, gaining speed upgrades, shock powerups to slow other racers, repairing powerups and rockets to shoot kamikaze drones.

Simplified controls make it possible for everyone to fly. Just go up and down, turn left and right.

At the end of the 40 levels, 3 time challenges are available for unlimited gameplay.

Switch to the first person view for more immersive gameplay.

Plays best with a controller! The right stick used for steering left and right is very sensitive. It will be needed later, when racing becomes more extreme.

"NightHover" is also available now for free in Google Play on Android. Steering on Android is done by turning the phone like a steering wheel. You might want to try it, if you do not like a keyboard or a controller.
